amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to require a report from the Secretary of Defense on the use of taxpayer-funded official time.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require a report from the Secretary of Defense on the use of taxpayer-funded official time.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 228 (Roll no. 276).

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Perry.
